author: spacesailor24
content: Can anyone confirm that Infura Ropsten nodes don't currently support `eth_feeHistory`? And if so, does anyone have a node endpoint I can use?

author: timbeiko
content: I don't think it's been merged in most clients yet. Geth PR is still open (https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/23033). It seems merged in Besu, though: https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/2466

author: nieldlr
content: Is there perhaps any public node at the moment that I could play around with `eth_feeHistory`?

author: matkt0
content:
You can use this Besu node 
> curl --location --request POST 'http://18.116.30.130:8545/' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{
>     "id": 28,
>     "jsonrpc": "2.0",
>     "method": "eth_feeHistory",
>     "params": [
>       7,
>       "latest",
>       [
>         0.0,
>         0.0,
>         0.0
>       ]
>     ]
>   }'

author: brad.decker
content: are there any nodes with https urls we can use to test?
